review: Plays like garbage. It's one of those games where the animators were never told 'no' so you press W and it takes five minutes for your character to turn around and build up momentum before you actually move. You fight the controls more than you do enemy NPCs. Very 'cinematic' but plays worse than a Telltale game.Written by a twelve year old. If you still watch South Park in 2018 you might get something out of it but then you've got bigger problems. It's not clever it's just obnoxious.There's little real progression. In the old games you could at least tolerate the lazy quest design and writing until you unlocked the third island but there is no second or third island in GTA5. Within a couple of hours you'll gain access to aircraft. So what's the player's incentive to do another mission full of characters clunky shooting and Trevor screaming all his lines?DRM nightmare. I didn't touch the game for a few months then when I tried to get back in to it I had to log in to Steam then log in to 'Rockstar's Social Club'. Steam is already DRM why the hell do you need your own DRM crap too? I'll never touch the Online crap yet you still need to go through this to play a singleplayer game. Rockstar asks for a username and password when you sign up which I wrote down but then demands your email to actually log in so why the hell did you ask for a username? Took me half an hour to find the old Rockstar confirmation email and figure out which email address I needed to log in with. Then it made me re agree to something like ten different EULAs/ToS (not an exaggeration) followed by a nightmare are you human recapcha test.I'm probably not allowed to recommend piracy but if you really want to play this mess it may be the objectively superior option and pirates may get a better version of the game than paying customers.

review: It's a good game. Better ARK Survival Evolved. It's just a fun game to mess around with your friends. Just go around doing missions or just whatever you want. It's got it all. It may be pricey but its worth the money because of its gigantic world online and playing with other people. If you don't want to pay the full price wait for a sale or something it's definitely a game to play ONCE at least in your lifetime. D

title: Grand Theft Auto V

review: This game has the worst ever game servers known to man dont even bother playing online if your not from murica because you will just get disconnected from all games having more then 5 players.Also if im gonna be harsh might aswell point out how Online is a clusterf*ck of vehicles &amp weapons not actually fitting the game and SP is still a far cry from the golden days of GTA (sure it looks fancyer but if even GTA4 has better gameplay/npc ai/destruction/game balance then part 5 you have to wonder) and SP didnt really see any patches since the last gen release (even though theres serious game breaking bugs there) other then adding a pathetically bad copy of the interaction menu from GTA Online.All in all sure its GTA you'll have some fun but theres clearly a quality drop and Online (which is the only thing they want us to play it seems) is a f*cking mess.Yes ive played the game 100's of hours but know that most of those where spent cursing at how i or randomly anybody would disconnect during missions/heists latelly (with all the 'new' stuff) ive been trying the game again and the server issues have only gotten worse ALOT worse. i can definitely see why one of the founders of GTA has left R* because of how f*cked up Online is. End of 2017 update The online portion of the game is completelly out of wack now a days theres every sort of military vehicle imaginable now and every random joe uses them to grief others anything they add has insane prices (a jacket? 50k plz a car? 1 5mil plz etc) and theres still no new heists still no stock market in online (thats been in limbo since 2013) and all they add these days are ridicilous gamemodes things like racing tiny cars (not rc tho because that would fit to much with gta's past) or a straight off pubg ripoff and dont even get me started on like tron lightcycles and batmobiles just wow way to sell out your franchise R*

review: GTA V is a really good game unfortunatly people are mad because the summer sale at this game is a total they evaluate only that thing people this is not rockstar games fault its valve s fault !!! In this review I will evaluate theese things 1. My Personal Score(This is the only thing that matters for me!)2. The Storyline(How is the storyline how thrilling it is how much I liked it and so on)3. Multyplater(GTA Online)4. How is the game itselfTLDR AT THE FINAL1. So MY PERSONAL SCORE is 9.1/10 I will explain why is 9.1/10 and not 10/102. The storyline is great the action is really good the plot is fantastic and ofc the shooting is really good3. GTA Online is a fantastic idea that made me buy this game on PC because I have it on PS3 and it was cracked so the cracked MP servers were garbage only hackers and modders I expected GTA Online on PC to be a lot different from the one on PS3 but it was just a bit different people WITHOUT hacks and mods wanted money from the people WITH hacks and mods and that in my eyes is a really stupid thing if you ing want money go ing do a heist or even buy shark cards witch would be the most idiotic idea ever or like the idiots(modders) do GET THE A MOD! A friend of mine took mods because "There were too many ing hackers and he couldnt bare it anymore" I wanted to ask him a question WHY THE DO YOU WANT MODS? WHAT IS THE POINT OF THE ING GAME IF YOU ALREADY HAVE THE THINGS YOU SHOULD HAVE WORKED FOR?Evry time the I join a lobby a hacker is in it Thats why I said 9.1/10 if all the hackers would be gone i would make it 11/10.4. The game itself is really good the grafics are good and the voice actors and the caracters are fantastic Rockstar Games hired real life criminals that got out of jail to voice actor Trevor Michael Franklin and Lamar TLDR The game is grate I recomand you all to play it!
